ygData.subject: Re: Crisson's
ygData.msgSnippet: It s a single target stun spell.  About a 15 second duration if it works. Don t attack the target, it wakes it up.  Great for tattooing multiple mobs when
ygData.messageBody:
It's a single target stun spell. About a 15 second duration if it works.
Don't attack the target, it wakes it up. Great for tattooing multiple mobs
when you're ganged up on, it's more effective than lullaby in the duration
and success rate.
----- Original Message -----
From: <OLadyNimue@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 11:57 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Crisson's


>From: OLadyNimue@...
